content.question: The Pantheon in Rome is believed to have been built as

choices.label: an imperial forum to commemorate military victories
a royal audience hall to receive guests and tribute
a temple dedicated to the worship of the gods
a tomb to house the ashes of the emperor

content.answer: a temple dedicated to the worship of the gods

topic.text: 2.1: Cultural Contexts of Ancient Mediterranean Art

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe contextual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. function.  b. context.  c. siting or physical context.  d. subject matter.  e. reception.
